price: Dies, weil Allah die Schrift mit der Wahrheit offenbart hat. Und diejenigen, die über die Schrift uneinig sind, befinden sich wahrlich in tiefem Widerstreit.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ نَزَّلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ بِٱلۡحَقِّۗ وَإِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱخۡتَلَفُواْ فِي ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لَفِي شِقَاقِۭ بَعِيدٖ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: dhālika bi-anna al-laha nazzala al-kitāba bil-ḥaqi wa-inna alladhīna ikh'talafū fī al-kitābi lafī shiqāqin baʿīdin
